body.section:
Welcome to the Project Multi-Media-Manager (MMM). The project is still under development. Before you get lost, first some words of what you can already find here before we talk about the TODOs.
This project provides the following generic components that can already be used now:
mmm-search provides a full-text solution base on lucene.
mmm-util contains powerful utilities.

The Multi-Media-Manager (MMM) is a generic application plattform and a enterprise content management system (ECMS) with custom modules for multi-media management build on top.
Designed with beauty.
Coded with passion.
Tested with care.
Documented with devotion.
MMM is entirely written in Java. It makes extensive use of the Java 5 syntax. All code is written with focus on design & quality and comes with detailed API documentation.
The application is heavily based on the idioms separation of concerns (SoC) and inversion of control (IoC) and therefore split into tiny components (see overview). This open architecture allows any component implementation to be reused (by other projects) or be replaced (for custom needs).
ATTENTION:
This mission statement applies to subprojects (modules) that are released. Modules that are NOT released (version less than 1.0.0 including 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT) may be completely refactored, change their API or even dissappear completely.
Even though the project exists for 6 years now, there is no CMS and no multi-media management available. If you are looking for open, flexible and well-designed software components (see "Ready to use") or you want to get involved (see getting-involved) and let the vision of MMM become reality then you are at the right place.
